reaction: An ability that can be used outside of your turn in response to specific triggers.
dodge: A defensive reaction that can be used against certain attacks to reduce damage or avoid it entirely.
block: A defensive reaction that reduces incoming damage.
scene: An effect that persists for the duration of the current scene or encounter.
combo: An ability that allows you to use multiple actions in sequence.
tier 1: The basic level of an ability with standard effects.
tier 2: An enhanced version of an ability with stronger effects.
surge charge: A resource that can be spent to power up abilities or trigger special effects.
